name: Cold Macaroni Salad with Hot Dogs
author: Brew Crew
summary: Shell pasta, hot dogs, manzanilla olives and Cheddar cheese combine to make a unique pasta salad.
ingredients: ¾ cup green manzanilla olives stuffed with pimento, halved
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®), or as needed
directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook shell pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes
Drain and run under cold water to chill
Place pasta in a salad bowl and combine with hot dogs, olives, Cheddar cheese, and creamy salad dressing
Stir in more salad dressing if mixture seems dry
